CNG Services

URL:

https://www.cngservices.co.uk/

Agency:

Pixel Bottom

Challenge:

CNG Services contacted me as they had seen my work on the CNG Fuels website. They had a website which was built on Joomla but it has many issues and they were very keen to get it updated and make it easier to update as the Joomla platform was very complicated. They also wanted to integrate on some form of analytics tool to help grow there customers.

Solution:

I decided to move the site to WordPress as it is much easier to update the website for people who are not very computer literate, I also use Google Analytics as the tool to use for their analytics as it is very easy to use, and has extensive information on the users of the website. The clients were very happy with the final result

Features:

  • ->  Site to be easily maintained and updated
  • ->  Site analytics

Technology:

HTML, CSS, WordPress, JavsScript
